title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 351 - Plastic Bag Reduction, Reuse and Recycling
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 351 - Plastic Bag Reduction, Reuse and Recycling

State Regulations

Subpart 351-1 - General Provisions (§ 351-1.1 to 351-1.6)

Subpart 351-2 - Requirements for Persons Required to Collect Tax, Store Operators, Owners of Enclosed Shopping Malls, and Manufacturers (§ 351-2.1 to 351-2.4)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 351

Amended

New

York State Register February 26, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 08, eff. 3/14/2020

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§ 1-0101, 3-0301, article 27, titles 27 and
28. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
